hero.title: Ahmed Muidh Alharthy
hero.subtitle: Software Developer | MIS Student
hero.tagline: Building tools, dashboards, and games that matter.
about.title: About Me
about.who.title: Who I Am
about.who.text: I'm a passionate software developer and MIS student at Taif University with a GPA of 3.56/4. I love creating efficient solutions, whether it's web applications, games, or automation tools. My journey in tech started with scripting for games, which evolved into full-stack development and 3D modeling. I'm constantly learning and exploring new technologies to build impactful projects.
about.education.title: Education
about.skills.title: My Skills
about.stats.title: GitHub Stats
services.title: What I Do
services.web.title: Web & Dashboard Development
services.web.text: Building responsive, user-friendly websites and powerful dashboards with modern frameworks like React and Node.js.
services.games.title: Game Development
services.games.text: Creating engaging games using Godot Engine and scripting for platforms like MTA:SA with Lua.
services.modeling.title: 3D Modeling
services.modeling.text: Designing and modeling 3D assets for games and applications using Blender.
services.design.title: UI/UX Design
services.design.text: Crafting intuitive and beautiful user interfaces with Figma and implementing them in code.
services.bots.title: Automation & Bots
services.bots.text: Developing Discord bots and automation tools to streamline workflows and enhance productivity.
services.db.title: Database & Server Management
services.db.text: Setting up and managing databases (MySQL, MongoDB) and servers (Ubuntu) for optimal performance.
